wikipedia_page.main: Howard Griffiths (8 October 1935 – 24 October 1999) was a screen and television writer born in Wales who wrote Licensed to Kill and many Australian television shows.

response: *Howard Griffiths (screenwriter) (1935–1999), Welsh-born screenwriter for Australian television shows

Welsh Trinity College, Oxford graduate and former RAF Intelligence Howard GriffithsThe Australian Obituary 16 Nov 1999 emigrated to Australia where he wrote extensively for Australian television series such as the spy series Hunter (1967), and police shows Division 4, Homicide, and Blue Heelers.
